title: i drew soulstealer vayne for 8 rp

embed.description: Post with 2 views. aluxisbored soulstealer vayne quality artwork masterpiece

body:
i need 8 more rp for headmistress fiora in my snowdown shop lol. bless me with the 8 rp i need rito. thank you ;-;

reposting from a different board, cause i was told i should post this in riot support

replies.body:
Ayyyyyy dat's a nice Soulstealer Vayne! 

How the heck could I pass up making sure a player is able to buy Headmistress Fiora?! Make sure you've studied up for the finals, and be sure to double check your RP for that little boost ^_^

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=2ILPIOTW,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-12-15T02:26:26.707+0000)
>
> Ayyyyyy dat's a nice Soulstealer Vayne! 
> 
> How the heck could I pass up making sure a player is able to buy Headmistress Fiora?! Make sure you've studied up for the finals, and be sure to double check your RP for that little boost ^_^

aw thanks! much love <3
